name: Fiction
description: Imaginative storytelling that is not based on real events

name: Non-Fiction
description: Factual writing based on real people, events, and information

name: Science Fiction
description: Fiction dealing with futuristic concepts, space travel, time travel, etc.

name: Fantasy
description: Fiction involving magical elements, mythical creatures, or imaginary worlds

name: Mystery
description: Fiction that involves solving a crime or puzzling event

name: Romance
description: Fiction focusing on love and romantic relationships

name: Horror
description: Fiction intended to scare, unsettle, or frighten the reader

name: Biography
description: Non-fiction account of someone's life written by another person

name: History
description: Non-fiction works about past events

name: Self-Help
description: Books designed to help readers solve personal problems

name: Thriller
description: Fiction characterized by fast pacing, tension, and suspense

name: Poetry
description: Literary work that uses aesthetic and rhythmic qualities of language

name: Young Adult
description: Fiction written for readers aged 12-18

name: Children's
description: Books written for children under 12 years old

name: Science
description: Non-fiction works about scientific topics and discoveries

name: Business
description: Books about business practices, economics, and entrepreneurship

name: Cookbooks
description: Books containing recipes and cooking techniques

name: Travel
description: Books about travel experiences and destinations

name: Graphic Novels
description: Book-length stories told through comic-style illustrations

name: Classics
description: Works of literature considered to be of lasting artistic merit
